mapper.select:
select * from ( select t.*, rownum as rnum from ( select s.s_id, s.s_name, cm.catem_name, s.s_spname, (select count(*) from pay p, final_order fo, orderinfo oi where p.p_ck='Y' and oi.s_id=s.s_id and oi.o_code=fo.o_code and fo.fo_code=p.fo_code ) as payCount from store s, cate_main cm where s.catem_code=cm.catem_code
and cm.catem_code=#{catem_code}
order by payCount desc) t)
where rnum>=1 and rnum<=10

select * from ( select g_code, g_spname from goods where s_id=#{s_id} order by g_date desc )
where rownum<=4
